@graph.title: State-space control systems : the MATLAB®/Simulink® approach
@graph.abstract: Intro -- Preface -- Entering the State-Space Model into MATLAB/Simulink Environment -- Introduction -- State-Space Representation -- State-Space Model of a Mechanical System -- Entering the State-Space Model into MATLAB -- Entering the State-Space Models to Simulink -- Modeling the State-Space Model Using the Integrator Block -- Simulation of State-Space Model with the Aid of MATLAB Function Block -- Simulation with the Aid of ode23 or ode45 -- Further Reading -- Linearization of Nonlinear Systems -- Introduction -- Linearization Using Hand Calculations -- Linearization of Inverted Pendulum on a Cart Using MATLAB -- Linearization of Inverted Pendulum on a Cart Using Simulink -- Further Reading -- Designing State Feedback Controller -- Introduction -- Example 1: DC Motor Speed Control -- Obtaining the State-Space Model of System -- Designing the Full-State Feedback Controller -- Addition of a Gain Block for Solving the Steady-State Error Problem -- Example 2: DC Motor Position Control Problem -- Designing the Full-State Feedback Controller -- Addition of an Integrator Block for Solving the Steady-State Error Problem -- Example 3: Magnetic Levitation System -- Modeling the System -- Designing the Full-State Feedback Controller -- Addition of a Gain Block for Solving the Steady-State Error Problem -- Designing the Observer -- References -- Author's Biography -- Blank Page.
